title: Baby Crypto-bro
description: This is a mystery puzzle! (No, the title is not suggestive of anything...) Buena suerte.
hint: Do some digging on the given webpage
successMessage: Awww do you finally understand how RSA works? I guess next step is Elliptic Curves! Haha jk... unless?
failureMessage: It was quite an involved process. I don't hold your failures against you.
